item.title: CVE-2022-41615|2024-08-03T12:49:43.372Z -- agilelogix -- store%20locator%20wordpress%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) via Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Store Locator plugin <= 1.4.5 on WordPress.
